alert.note: Alert for Carter; Cocke; Greene; Hawkins; Johnson; Unicoi; Washington (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 10:56PM CDT until August 15 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Hawkins County in east Tennessee... Washington County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Cocke County in east Tennessee... Greene County in east Tennessee... Unicoi County in east Tennessee... Southern Johnson County in east Tennessee... Carter County in east Tennessee... * Until 100 AM EDT. * At 1155 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles west of Greeneville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Johnson City, Greeneville, Elizabethton, Erwin, Jonesborough, Tusculum, Parrottsville, Banner Hill, Central, and Midway. This includes the following highways... Interstate 26 in Tennessee between mile markers 11 and 54. Interstate 81 in Tennessee between mile markers 29 and 53. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Carter; Cocke; Greene; Hawkins; Johnson; Unicoi; Washington
